local_intent: detect red_plate, move above to 0.06m, align for placement, verify position
assumptions: robot can reach above red_plate at offset_z=0.06
white_plate is secured in gripper prior to transfer
coherence_with_global: Replaces the MoveAbove leaf in the global sequence with a local subtree that adds perception (DetectObject), the required MoveAbove (offset_z=0.06), alignment, and a final positional check consistent with the transfer phase of the global plan.
